CustomField.formula: IF ((ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, "Accepted") && RecordType.Name = 'Renewal Quote' && APT_Contracted_Product_Count__c > 0 && NOT(ISPICKVAL( APT_Dangerous_Goods_Status__c, 'Pending Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(APT_Dangerous_Goods_Status__c, 'Rejected')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, 'Pending Approval')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( APT_Overweight_Approval_Status__c, 'Rejected'))), HYPERLINK("/lightning/cmp/c__APT_ContractServiceDetailsWrapper?c__proposalId="&Id&'&c__isST='&TEXT(Is_Startrack_Proposal__c)&'&c__isManualContract=false&c__isRenew=true', IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_Renewal_Contract", "Create Renewal Contract"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Create Contract Renewal
